author: theblock.co
title: SEC clears Trump Media filing, opening door to multi-billion-dollar Bitcoin buy
description: The firm has not said how much of the $2.3 billion in capital it raised from around 50 institutional investors will go towards BTC purchases.
content:
The firm has not said how much of the $2.3 billion in capital it raised from around 50 institutional investors will go towards BTC purchases.
This story appeared on theblock.co, 2025-06-14 19:01:42.
